summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City employment, to be known as the Second Quarter 2002 Salary Ordinance, establishing new titles and/or salaries in various departments; designating one position as exempt from civil service; amending an effective date from previous legislation (Ordinance \#120069, Section 1); reinstating eligibility for the Magistrate to receive base wage cost-of-living adjustments for nonrepresented personnel; all by a 2/3 vote of the City Council.
